original_title: Over 800 university lecturers left Sri Lanka -FUTA
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Over 800 university lecturers have left Sri Lanka this year.
Spokesperson of the Federation of University Teachers' Associations Senior Lecturer Charudaththe Illangasinghe said nearly 1,000 more are overseas on leave.
He added that as a result academic activities at universities have been severely affected.
At the start of this year, around 6,200 university lecturers served in Sri Lankan universities.
Senior Lecturer Charudaththe Illangasinghe said the recruitment of new lecturers for the universities has also come to a stop at present.
